entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is one of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Harry mentions that he will take points from Gryffindor if he fails to retrieve the Stone.

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Weasley is another house at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Harry says 'Yes, Weasley' indicating that he is referring to his own house.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main protagonist of the story. He is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and classmate at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's other friend and classmate at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is also the Potions master.

entities.name: flitwick
entities.description: Flitwick is a teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He teaches Charms.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is also the Transfiguration professor.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a dark wizard who is trying to return to power. Harry mentions that if Snape gets hold of the Stone, Voldemort will come back.

relationships.description: Harry is a member of Gryffindor house at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
Harry says 'Yes, Weasley' indicating that he is referring to his own house.
Snape is trying to get hold of the Stone.
Harry wants to try and get to the Stone first.
If Snape gets hold of the Stone, Voldemort will come back.
